Package jason.asSyntax

Class CyclicTerm

java.lang.Object
jason.asSyntax.DefaultTerm
jason.asSyntax.Literal
jason.asSyntax.Atom
jason.asSyntax.Structure
jason.asSyntax.Pred
jason.asSyntax.LiteralImpl
jason.asSyntax.CyclicTerm
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogicalFormula, Term, ToDOM, ToJson, Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Term>
public class CyclicTerm extends LiteralImpl
A term with recursion (cyclic), created by code like X = f(X).
See Also:
